title: Spirit Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out
description: A vegetarian health food store, holistic wellness center, and food & drinks bar. Serving smoothies, protein shakes, elixirs, and wellness shots along with light food like wraps, salads, acai & pitaya bowls, vegan parfait. A comprehensive list of healing modalities are available such as infrared sauna and nutritional biofeedback testing. Lake views. Free Wi-Fi. Shop sells yoga-inspired apparel, dry skin brushes, natural toothpaste, shower filters, and books.
